name: Connection
description: A third-party connection of the discord user who has authorized your app to have access to their data.

properties.description: The id of the third-party account.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The username of the third-party account.
properties.name: name

properties.description: The name of the service providing the third-party account.
properties.name: service

properties.description: Whether the user has revoked this connection.
properties.name: isRevoked

properties.description: Whether the user has verified this connection.
properties.name: isVerified

properties.description: Whether the user has enabled friend synchronization.
properties.name: friendSync

properties.description: Whether to show the activity in the connected account in Rich Presence.
properties.name: showActivity

properties.description: Whether is account is visible on the user's profile.
properties.name: isPublic

name: toJSON
description: Converts the connection into a JSON object.

params.description: The connection object data returned by the discord API.
params.name: data
